mapper.insert: insert into user(id, phone, email, wxnum, qqnum, password, realName, nickName, gender, birthday, createdTime, updatedTime, avatarUrl) values (#{id}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{wxnum}, #{qqnum}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{avatarUrl})
mapper.update:
update user
phone=#{phone},
password=#{password},
email=#{email},
wxnum=#{wxnum},
qqnum=#{qqnum},
realName=#{realName},
nickName=#{nickName},
gender=#{gender},
birthday=#{birthday},
createdTime=#{createdTime},
updatedTime=#{updatedTime}
avatarUrl=#{avatarUrl}
mapper.select: select id as id, phone as phone, email as email, wxnum as wxnum, qqnum as qqnum, password as password, realName as realName, nickName as nickName, gender as gender, birthday as birthday, createdTime as createdTime, updatedTime as updatedTime, avatarUrl as avatarUrl from user where phone = #{phone} and password = #{password}
